attributes.action: JUSTICE FOR HEALTH CARE WORKERS. STOP THE PROPOSAL FOR BAN DEPENDANTS OF  CARES
attributes.additional_details:
We, health care workers are working hard to earn daily bread and  have the right to reside with our family same like other skilled workers do.Implementing  changes to  these new rules has bought immense pressure, bizarre and insecurity for the minor folk.

 Please consider and understand the challenges ,the health care workers facing and defer to implement the laws against this population.
attributes.background: We s agree that the Government wants to control the immigration but why do only  care workers have to suffer ? We are also human beings and we have family as well. It is clear that this is a pure scenario of  discrimination and it's totally against the Britain's traditions, supporting family values.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652784
